verbs.label: Pier: Bench
verbs.description: The pier stretches into the sea, offering an escape from the bustling tavern nearby. A wooden bench sits at its end. To one side, a small boat is tied to weathered post.

slot.label: Character/Event
slot.description: Being on the pier requires at least one main character.

verbs.label: Tavern: Keeper's Seat
verbs.description: The seat belongs to the tavern's current keeper. It might be the scribe, or even the minstrel, if the taverner is too drunk.

slot.label: Character
slot.description: Keeping the tavern in order requires at least one person.

verbs.label: Tavern: Owners' Room - Desk
verbs.description: The private room is where the taverner and the scribe reside. It has a bed, a desk, a roof that was recently repaired, and a vault containing all their money.

slot.label: Character
slot.description: Using the desk requires at least one person.

slot.label: Character
